title: Yulia Skripal discharged from the hospital
text:
Yulia Skripal discharged from the hospital Tuesday, April 10, 2018 - 00:48 
Yulia Skripal has been released from the hospital following a ''significant milestone'' in her treatment, according to the medical director of the hospital's trust, Christine Blanshard. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Yulia Skripal has been released from the hospital following a "significant milestone" in her treatment, according to the medical director of the hospital's trust, Christine Blanshard. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2HmSGtz
